Londeka Mchunu (amụrụ n'abalị iri nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1994), bu onye ome ihe nkiri na ome ejiji nlereanya South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri Soap opera dịka, Isithembiso, Isibaya na Ụlọ Zwide
A mụrụ Mchunu n'abalị́ iri nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1994 na Msinga n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụnne iri
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ  O mechara tolite na Clermont, KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa, mgbe ya na nne ya kwagara mgbe ọ dị afọ isi
Nwanne ya nwanyị, Nelisa Mchunu bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara nkwukọrịta na Varsity College
N'afo 2016, n'oge ọnụnọ ya na Varsity College, o mere ihe ngosi maka telenovela ọhụrụ nke Bomb Productions mepụtara
Mgbe ihe omere masiri masịrị ndị na-emepụta ihe, ọ nwetara ohere ịrụ ọrụ ndu dị ka"Snegugu Magwaza" na Mzansi Magic msa emesịa bụrụ Mzansi Wethu Soap opera bu Isithembiso na 2017
Soap opera ahụ ghọrọ Ihe nkiri ama ama ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ahụ ruo oge atọ ruo 2020 nke gụnyere ihe karịrị narị  usoro asaa
N'afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha ọhụrụ na TV na onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma na TV maka ihe nkiri Simon Sabela na ihe nkiri Television yana maka ọrụ ahụ
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2020, ọ sonyeere ndị ọrụ nke oge asatọ nke Mzansi Magic soap opera Isibaya wee mee ọrụ ugboro ugboro nke "Londiwe"
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ sonyere na e.tv soap opera House of Zwide wee rụọ ọrụ nkwado nke "Zanele Zwide"
